transcript:
Customer: Bataiye sir.
Executive: Katia ke hoon ji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Phone kyu kaat diya sir?
Customer: Sir kyuki aap mujhe samajh nahi aa raha tha aap kya bol rahe the sir aap bataiye mujhe jo bhi hai isko hum conclude karte hai na sir aap lagatar bol rahe the to jo cheez hai clear kar lenge na.
Executive: Nahi bol to aap sir angreji mein bol rahe the kya aap kehte ho bhi angreji aapko samajh nahi aati isliye angreji mein baat kar rahe the ji.
Customer: Nahi nahi aisa kuch bhi nahi hai main apni baat rakh raha tha kyuki aap mujhse accuse kar rahe the na ki maine aisa kar diya maine kuch bhi nahi kiya humne kabhi aapko koi package.
Executive: Kal aapko baat hui thi aap keh rahe ha.
Customer: Ha maine kabhi aapko suggest nahi kiya na package ke liye na kisi cheez ke liye aapne mujhe bola maine aapko ek price de diya sir wo jo bhi hai aap check kar sakte ho aur usko usko.
Executive: Chalo aapki kal wali baat hi bata rahe hain aap kal wali baat mein interested hai baat karne ke liye maine aapko kaha tha bhi sir is hum vyapari bande hain isko hum badhana nahi chahte isko hum kam karna chahte hain yahi baat hui thi ji.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Ha sir sun raha hu boliye boliye.
Customer: Ha.
Executive: Sir usko karna hai baat ka main na karu ji main usi hisab se karunga jaise aap chahoge shortcut mein kahoge to shortcut mein kar leta hu jaise aap chahoge usi hisab se kar leta hu.
Customer: Kal wali baat ho gayi na kitni bari ek hi cheez aap baat karoge aap aap isko conclude kijiye na ek hi cheez hum repeatedly ek hi discussion karte hai aap conclude kijiye.
Executive: Chalo baat chhodo usko ji usko chhodo bas theek hai sir baat aisi hai.
Customer: Conclude kijiye sir.
Executive: Bas theek hai usko repeat it repeat it chhodo do chhodo do main aapko isliye kaha na jo bhi baat karoge shortcut mein shortcut mein sir meri baat aisi hai.
Customer: Shortcut wali baat nahi baat to kar hi rahe hai na 10 din se baat kar rahe hai aap ek hi cheez bar bar aa rahe ho hamare paas to conclude kijiye na us discussion ko.
Executive: Sir nikle hi nahi hamara koi 10 din ka ji hamara teen mahine ka nahi koi package matlab ki nikla sir baat aisi hai.
Customer: Meri baat suno mein time lag lead aa rahi hai but ha jo numbers hai.
Executive: Sir mere paas bhi verb hai aisi baat na karna ji aisi baat na karna sir pata kya hai aisi baat na karna meri baat sun lo us hisab se jo bhi mujhe batana hai mujhe mail pe bata dena meri baat sun lo ek baat phir na baat aisi hai sir maine India mart ke aapke dwara package liya gaya tha aapke mulazim dwara ji.
Customer: Hello sun pa rahe hai ji.
Executive: Sun sun raha hu bolte rahiye sir aapko bolne nahi de rahe ho bolo na.
Customer: Main chup ho ja raha hu aap boliye nahi to boli nahi rahe ho.
Executive: Theek hai ha sir baat aisi hai jo package hame diya gaya jis hisab se discount karke jo bhi amount li gayi humse.
Customer: 28000 28000.
Executive: Te us hisab se sir jo bhi hai matlab ki wo kam nahi ho sakti jyada nahi ho sakti jo amount aapke khate mein dali hui hai chahe wo 28000 hai chahe 20000 hai chahe 30000 hai chahe 40000 hai jo account hamare dwara bheji gayi hai aap dwara receive kiya gaya hai usme hame all India ka package humne bol kar liya tha number ek ji te hamare dwara matlab ki jo unhone dwara diya gaya tha 17 lead batai gayi thi saat lead ek 10 lead bonus wali ji te kisi tarah ka hame koi package matlab ki all India wala package nahi mila ji jo bhi lead aa rahi thi hame kisi tarah ki lead jab bhi aati thi wo khatam ho jati thi ya hame purani lead aa rahi thi koi 10 din ki koi panch din ki koi saat din ki jo bhi lead aa rahi thi koi ek piece ki aa rahi thi koi farji lead aa rahi thi jispe hum baat kar rahe the bhi sir ye farji lead aa rahi hai humne maal nahi lena humne lena nahi agar koi humne aapke dwara jitni bar bhi bheja gaya baat ki gayi aapne usi time baat ki jab bhi hamara profile 15 din pehle aapne aapke dwara jab hum bheja gaya bhi hamare paas lead nahi aa rahi kyu hai aap profile hamara change kar dete the te 15 din pehle usme photo dal diya aapke isliye nahi aa raha jo bhi karna tha sara kuch kar diya par lead hamare paas nahi aa rahi sir uske dwara jab humne kaha aapke mulazim matlab ki toll free number pe aapko joda gaya mam dusri ko joda gaya to bhi nahi aaya phir humne kaha bhi hamare paas lead nahi band matlab ki ho rahi to aapke dwara jahan se bataya gaya bhi jo aapne package liya gaya hai us pe lead consume nahi hogi ji bas yahi baat hai bhi hamare jo teen mahine aapke dwara jo matlab ki lead gayi hai hamare staff ka nuksan hua hai swere se sham tak hum baithe rehte the ji theek hai hum aapke dwara kisi bhi tarah ke hamare matlab ki aise nahi hai bhi hame koi dikkat thi isliye main aapka India mart ka package liya hum kam ke liye hi liya tha par hum teen mahine se haras ho rahe hain ji teen mahine hamari date kharab hui ji producton ki isliye matlab ki jo bhi matlab ki jisne jis jo package becha hai us pe karwai ho jo hamara nuksan hua hai uski bharpai ho bas aur koi dikkat nahi hai kisi se hame koi dikkat nahi hai koi chakkar nahi hai ji hello ha ha ji ha sir kisi se koi problem nahi hai kyuki vyapari banda kyuki sara kam karne ke liye karke karta hai aaj nahi karenge do din ruk ke kar lenge 10 din ruk ke kar lenge 15 saal se jude hue hai sir India mart pe ji humne ye bhi kaha aapke dwara bhi hamare paas lead kyu nahi aati India mart pe lead khatam ho gayi ji hamare paas jab bhi baat hoti to aapko bhejte ji screenshot leke bhejte swere 9 baje se lekar sham ko raat ko 10 baje tak hum us pe baithe hain ji computer pe kara aapki lead nahi matlab ki aa rahi ji lead aa rahi hai te chali gayi ji humne dali hi nahi ji jahan customer hi nahi hai ji hame chahiye hi nahi hai ji ek dibbe ki lead aa rahi hai ek piece ki lead aa rahi hai ji kyuki hum jhoot bol sakte hain sara biodata aapke paas hai ji hamare paas to hai hi hai aapke paas data hai ji sara aap kahoge bhi lead consume ho rahi hai kahan ja rahi hai lead aapke paas aa rahi hai ji hamare paas jo bhi aayi hai farji lead aayi hai humne aapke toll free number pe complaint ki ji 10 bar 10 bar baat hui bhi hamare paas lead nahi aati ji jo hamari profile thi usko aise kar lo usko aise kar lo usko aise kar lo aap kehte ji aapke dwara bataya gaya bhi jab bhi aap UP mein teen thame aap consume kar rahe hain hum all India mein matlab ki filter laga ke dekh liya jo bhi baat thi sara kuch karke dekh liya hamare paas lead nahi aa rahi humne jab matlab ki na hal hua to aapke dwara jo hamare appoint kiye gaye manager the senior manager the jo bhi sir the humne unke dwara baat ki gayi bhi kyu nahi aayegi lead uske dwara aapke dwara bataya gaya bhi number ek jo abhishek ji ne aapko plan becha hai wo galat bech diya aapka jo plan hai India ka nahi hai ye kalla district ka plan hai bhi isme aap district mein show ho rahe hain India mein show nahi ho rahe ji number ek number do is pe aapko lead aayegi nahi ji jo chahe jitna marji filter laga lo aur laga lo isliye kuch bhi hai isme lead nahi aayegi aapko bade wali bade wali lead hum bade walon matlab ki dete hain jo 4 lakh ka package lete hain hame nahi pata bhi char ka lete hain do ka lete hain ek ka lete hain bhi hamare sath kyu dhokha kiya gaya agar iska jo bhi hai jisne bhi galat kiya hai us pe karwai ho hame koi dikkat nahi hai hamare jo hai nuksan hua hai uski bharpai ho hame koi dikkat nahi hai aage se kisi bhi customer ke sath hum aapke 15 saal se jude hue hain humse dhokha hua hai unhone kyu kiya hamara registered number hai aapke paas 15 saal se ji agar hamara vishwas bana hua tha aaj bhi vishwas hai kal bhi vishwas tha par hamare matlab ki vishwas ko thes pahunchi India mart pe dwara matlab ki jo kisi ne bhi kiya kyu kiya ji bas hame ye batao ji aap aur hame koi dikkat nahi hai hum iske kam karne ke liye jude the aur koi theek hai sir main call back karta hu aapko theek hai theek hai sir theek hai okay dhanyavad.
summary:
\n
Concerns:\n
- Customer received fake/old buyleads.
- Package sold was for district, not all India.
- Wants action against employee who sold wrong package.
- Wants compensation for the loss incurred.
\n
Resolution:\n
- Executive assured a call back.
\n
Next Steps: \n
- Executive will call back the customer.
\n
Alert (If Any):\n
refund\n
@@@Sentiment:\n
- Angry -> Satisfied\n
\n
@@@Key Topics:\n
- buyleads, package, refund, complaint, all india\n
\n
